fxInfo_citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: Consider which group(s) is supportive of the regime, and, if it/they were to retract support would substantially increase the chance that the regime would lose power. Do not code for years denoted as "interregnum".
fxInfo_cross_coder_aggregation: Bayesian Item Response Theory Measurement Model
fxInfo_question: Which groups does the current political regime rely on in order to maintain power?(Check all that apply.)

fxInfo_responses.value: The aristocracy, including high status hereditary social groups and castes.
Agrarian elites, including rich peasants and large landholders.
Party elites (of the party or parties that control the executive).
Urban working classes, including labor unions.
A foreign government or colonial power.

name: v3regsupgroups
